column2: Claiming estate exemptions
column3: Gwneud cais am eithriadau'r ystâd

column2: If you claim any exemptions, any debts that are owed from the estate will also be taken off the estate value.
column3: Os ydych yn gwneud cais am unrhyw eithriadau, caiff unrhyw ddyled sydd ar yr ystâd ei didynnu o werth yr ystâd hefyd.

column2: You will need to provide details of these assets in the estate exemptions section. You can save your progress and return to it at any time through the estate overview page.
column3: Bydd rhaid i chi roi manylion yr asedion hyn yn yr adran ynghylch eithriadau'r ystâd. Gallwch gadw'r manylion yr ydych wedi eu nodi a dychwelyd iddynt ar unrhyw adeg drwy'r dudalen drosolwg ar gyfer yr ystâd.

column2: You only need to claim estate exemptions if the estate value is over the Inheritance Tax threshold. If you do not know the estate value, it is recommended to only complete the assets, gifts and debts sections before you claim any exemptions.
column3: Does dim ond angen i chi wneud cais am eithriadau'r ystâd os yw gwerth yr ystâd yn uwch na'r trothwy Treth Etifeddiant. Os nad ydych yn gwybod beth yw gwerth yr ystâd, fe argymhellir y dylid ond llenwi'r adrannau asedion, rhoddion a dyledion cyn i chi wneud cais am unrhyw eithriadau.

column2: If you do not want to claim any estate exemptions,
column3: Os nad ydych am wneud cais am eithriadau'r ystâd,

column2: you can return to the estate overview page
column3: gallwch fynd yn ôl i'r dudalen drosolwg ar gyfer yr ystâd

column2: Some assets might be exempt from Inheritance Tax if they are being passed to a spouse or civil partner, a charity or to another qualifying body.
column3: Mae'n bosibl y bydd rhai asedion wedi'u heithrio rhag Treth Etifeddiant os ydynt yn cael eu trosglwyddo i briod neu bartner sifil, elusen neu i gorff cymwys arall.

column2: The estate value could become less than the Inheritance Tax threshold by claiming these exemptions.
column3: Gallai gwerth yr ystâd ddisgyn yn is na'r trothwy Treth Etifeddiant drwy wneud cais am yr eithriadau hyn.

column2: Go to estate exemptions
column3: Ewch i eithriadau'r ystâd

column2: You could bring the estate value below the threshold by claiming any estate exemptions.
column3: Gallech leihau gwerth yr ystâd yn is na'r trothwy drwy wneud cais am unrhyw eithriadau'r ystâd.

column2: Some of the deceased’s assets can be claimed as an exemption if they are being passed to a spouse or civil partner, a charity or to another qualifying body.
column3: Gellir gwneud cais am eithriad ar gyfer rhai o asedion yr ymadawedig os ydynt yn cael eu trosglwyddo i briod neu bartner sifil, elusen neu i gorff cymwys arall.

column2: The estate value is above the Inheritance Tax threshold
column3: Mae gwerth yr ystâd yn uwch na'r trothwy Treth Etifeddiant

column2: Continue to estate exemptions
column3: Ymlaen i eithriadau'r ystâd

column2: These are assets that are exempt from Inheritance Tax and deducted from the value of the estate.
column3: Mae'r rhain yn asedion sydd wedi eu heithrio rhag Treth Etifeddiant ac wedi'u didynnu o werth yr ystâd.

column2: If you do not know if assets passing to another body will be exempt from Inheritance Tax, call the Inheritance Tax helpline on 0300 123 1072. If you are outside of the UK, call +44 300 123 1072. Once you have given the name of the body, you will be told if any assets left to them will be exempt from Inheritance Tax.
column3: Os nad ydych yn gwybod a fydd asedion sy'n mynd i gorff arall wedi eu heithrio rhag Treth Etifeddiant, ffoniwch y llinell gymorth Treth Etifeddiant ar 0300 123 1072. Os ydych y tu allan i'r DU, ffoniwch +44 300 123 1072. Unwaith eich bod wedi rhoi enw'r corff, cewch wybod a fydd unrhyw asedion a adawyd iddo wedi eu heithrio rhag Treth Etifeddiant.

column2: Other qualifying bodies could include a community amateur sports club or charities outside of the UK.
column3: Gallai cyrff cymwys eraill gynnwys clwb chwaraeon amatur cymunedol neu elusennau y tu allan i'r DU.

column2: These are all of the assets being left to a qualifying body. These will not be charities that have a registered charity number.
column3: Dyma'r holl asedion sy'n cael eu gadael i gorff cymwys. Ni fydd y rhain yn elusennau sydd â rhif elusen gofrestredig.
